WWUS76 KSTO 311833
NPWSTO

URGENT - WEATHER MESSAGE
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE SACRAMENTO CA
1033 AM PST WED DEC 31 2014

CAZ015>019-064-066-067-010400-
/O.CAN.KSTO.WI.Y.0015.000000T0000Z-141231T2000Z/
/O.UPG.KSTO.FZ.A.0001.150101T0800Z-150102T2000Z/
/O.NEW.KSTO.FZ.W.0001.150101T0800Z-150102T2000Z/
NORTHERN SACRAMENTO VALLEY-CENTRAL SACRAMENTO VALLEY-
SOUTHERN SACRAMENTO VALLEY-CARQUINEZ STRAIT AND DELTA-
NORTHERN SAN JOAQUIN VALLEY-CLEAR LAKE/SOUTHERN LAKE COUNTY-
NORTHEAST FOOTHILLS/SACRAMENTO VALLEY-MOTHERLODE-
INCLUDING THE CITIES OF...REDDING...CHICO...SACRAMENTO...
STOCKTON...MODESTO...LAKEPORT...PARADISE...GRASS VALLEY...
JACKSON
1033 AM PST WED DEC 31 2014

...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON PST
FRIDAY...
...WIND ADVISORY IS CANCELLED...

THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN SACRAMENTO HAS ISSUED A FREEZE
WARNING...WHICH IS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON PST
FRIDAY. THE WIND ADVISORY HAS BEEN CANCELLED. THE FREEZE WATCH IS
NO LONGER IN EFFECT.

* TIMING: TEMPERATURES WILL DROP BELOW FREEZING EARLY THURSDAY
  MORNING AND REMAIN BELOW FREEZING THROUGH MID-MORNING. COLD
  TEMPERATURES ARE EXPECTED AGAIN THURSDAY NIGHT. 

* LOCATIONS INCLUDE: STOCKTON...MODESTO...SACRAMENTO...CHICO...
  REDDING...PARADISE...GRASS VALLEY...JACKSON...LAKEPORT.

* IMPACTS: DAMAGE POSSIBLE TO FREEZE SENSITIVE VEGETATION. 

* TEMPERATURES: IN THE UPPER 20S TO AROUND 30 DEGREES.

* FOR A DETAILED VIEW OF THE HAZARD AREA...VISIT 
  HTTP://WWW.WEATHER.GOV/SACRAMENTO/HAZARDS

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

A FREEZE WARNING MEANS SUB-FREEZING TEMPERATURES ARE IMMINENT OR
HIGHLY LIKELY. THESE CONDITIONS WILL KILL CROPS AND OTHER
SENSITIVE VEGETATION.

&&

INTERACT WITH US VIA SOCIAL MEDIA
WWW.FACEBOOK.COM/NWS.SACRAMENTO
WWW.TWITTER.COM/NWSSACRAMENTO

$$

CAZ013-063-068-311945-
/O.CAN.KSTO.WI.Y.0015.000000T0000Z-141231T2000Z/
SHASTA LAKE AREA / NORTHERN SHASTA COUNTY-
MOUNTAINS SOUTHWESTERN SHASTA COUNTY TO NORTHERN LAKE COUNTY-
WESTERN PLUMAS COUNTY/LASSEN PARK-
INCLUDING THE CITIES OF...ALDER SPRINGS...CHESTER...QUINCY
1033 AM PST WED DEC 31 2014

...WIND ADVISORY IS CANCELLED...

THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE IN SACRAMENTO HAS CANCELLED THE WIND
ADVISORY.

NORTH WINDS HAVE WEAKENED SLIGHTLY SINCE YESTERDAY. LOCALLY BREEZY
WINDS WILL CONTINUE THROUGH EARLY AFTERNOON BEFORE WEAKENING THIS
EVENING AND TONIGHT.

INTERACT WITH US VIA SOCIAL MEDIA
WWW.FACEBOOK.COM/NWS.SACRAMENTO
WWW.TWITTER.COM/NWSSACRAMENTO

$$

CAZ069-010000-
/O.EXT.KSTO.WI.Y.0015.000000T0000Z-150101T0000Z/
WEST SLOPE NORTHERN SIERRA NEVADA-
INCLUDING THE CITY OF...BLUE CANYON
1033 AM PST WED DEC 31 2014

...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON...

* WINDS: NORTHEAST 20 TO 30 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 50 MPH. LOCAL
  GUSTS 60 TO 80 MPH ALONG EXPOSED RIDGES. 

* TIMING: THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON.

* LOCATIONS INCLUDE: INTERSTATE 80...HIGHWAY 50...HIGHWAY 88.

* IMPACTS: DIFFICULT DRIVING CONDITIONS...POSSIBLE TREE DAMAGE 
  AND POWER OUTAGES. 

* FOR A DETAILED VIEW OF THE HAZARD AREA...VISIT 
  HTTP://WWW.WEATHER.GOV/SACRAMENTO/HAZARDS 

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

A WIND ADVISORY MEANS THAT WINDS OF 40 MPH OR STRONGER ARE
EXPECTED. WINDS THIS STRONG CAN MAKE DRIVING DIFFICULT...
ESPECIALLY FOR HIGH PROFILE VEHICLES. USE EXTRA CAUTION.

&&

WWW.TWITTER.COM/NWSSACRAMENTO
